summary: Freelance Software Engineer with 4+ years of hands-on experience building dynamic web solutions, including custom browser-based tools. Adept at delivering seamless user experiences by leveraging JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and modern frameworks. Skilled in API development, microservices architecture, and cloud deployment, with a proven record of problem-solving (Top 2.5% on LeetCode). Enthusiastic about optimizing workflows through specialized extensions and collaborative, remote-friendly projects that fuel creative innovation.

items.role: OwlBox AI | Software Engineer & Browser Extension Developer
details: Designed and implemented a custom Chrome extension to streamline an AI-driven video annotation workflow, leveraging JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and the Chrome Extension API for seamless user interactions.

Developed a robust microservices backend with Flask and Node.js to integrate annotation data, integrating Celery for asynchronous tasks, while managing CI/CD with GitHub Actions for AWS deployments (Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS).
Enhanced productivity for a remote, cross-functional team by introducing secure data handling protocols and user-friendly extension interfaces, resulting in a 20% reduction in manual processes.

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley | Head of Education & Software Engineer
details: Led frontend development for HakimHub using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux, integrating features such as real-time notifications and embedded media while emphasizing scalability and maintainability.

Architected and scaled Node.js microservices on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for RateEat, employing MongoDB, Redis, and Kubernetes to handle high-traffic restaurant rating data securely and efficiently.
Oversaw the full-stack development of EzyPay with Next.js, React, and Go on AWS, incorporating Docker for containerized deployments and ensuring a 99.9% uptime for payment processing services.
Built and deployed RESTful APIs using Flask, SQLAlchemy, and PostgreSQL, focusing on modular design and enhanced security for web-based applications.

Reduced bug incidence by implementing robust QA frameworks (Selenium, Jest, Cypress, and Postman) within Continuous Integration pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions), improving software stability across browsers.
Boosted efficiency for mobile payment services in Ethiopia by implementing high-performance backend services in Go.
Utilized containerization and AWS integrations to ensure consistent, scalable deployments.
Developed a dynamic React-based UI for crowd-sourced restaurant ratings and reviews.
Integrated RESTful API endpoints and Redux state management to handle real-time feedback and user interactions.
Programming Languages: Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, C/C++, Bash/Shell scripting, Scala
Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, React, Next.js, Redux, Vite, Vue.js, Vuex, Nuxt.js, Svelte
Browser Extension Development: Chrome Extension API, Secure Data Handling, Automated Testing
Backend Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, Django, Flask, FastAPI, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Lambda, S3, EC2, ECS, API Gateway), Docker, GitHub Actions, Kubernetes, Jenkins, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
Ranked in the Top 2.5% globally on LeetCode, showcasing advanced programming and algorithmic expertise.
Received $1000 in A2SV's Month-Long Coding Competition for delivering high-impact solutions under tight deadlines.
